title: Hummus
Desc: A vegan light dish for breakfast , launch and Dinner This oriental dish consist of boiled Chickpeas with cumin and olive oil,

title: Paella
Desc: Paella is a rice dish from Valencia, Spain. One of the most well-known dishes in Spanish cuisine, paella is popular worldwide. It gets its name from the Valencian word for frying pan. The traditional paella pan is round, shallow, wide, and has a short handle on either side.

title: Doner
Desc: The meal has different versions in the Middle East and Eastern Europe. The word donair has a Turkish origin. The Turkish spelling, döner, refers to the rotation of the meat being prepared. The Greek name is gyros and the word in Greek means round movement or spinning. In Arab countries like Syria and Lebanon, shawarma is very common and it’s a very similar meal.
